topic.title: Can I just copy the ZeroNet folder to my notebook?
topic.body:
So I set up ZeroNet on my desktop PC. Runs fine. I'm a productive part of the community now.
Can I just take that folder (with all the data) and copy it over to my notebook and run it at the same time? Provided I install all the required deps, etc. will there be any conflicts between my PC running ZeroNet and my notebook running ZeroNet? Are there some "Node IDs" I will have to re-generate or doesn't the protocol really care about that?
